text: Julián Andrés Rodas Ramírez (born 2 January 1982 in Pereira) is a Colombian former professional cyclist. ==Major results== ;2009 : 3rd Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st Stage 7 ;2012 : 1st Overall Vuelta Mexico Telmex ::1st Stage 2 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male cyclists Category:People from Pereira, Colombia
title: Julián Rodas
